text: End your _sadness_. Many people feel _sad_ just by seeing __your face__, you know ....
author: (c) 2022 Mr White Bogor

text: __There’s nothing__ that needs to be _changed_. You’re ___perfect___ in the eyes of those who _love_ you.
author: (c) 2025 Lutfi Nur Syafira

text: Let those who __dislike__ you be. __Don’t change__ yourself just for _them_. Life __only happens once__, so __don’t follow__ what people say.
author: (c) 2025 Mrs Yus M3A

text: Everyone __surely has__ _flaws_ and _strengths_, _faults_ and _virtues_. ___Focus on the strengths, see the virtues.___
author: (c) 2025 Mr Ilmi Kerang

text: _Joke_ with __class__, not jokes that __invade someone’s privacy__.
author: (c) 2025 Ust. Muhammad Rusli

text: Just _stay calm_ and _feel it_ ... because __not everything is meant to be told__.
author: (c) 2025 Lutfi Nur Syafira

text: Just _pretending_, so that people think we’re ___happy___ ....
author: (c) 2025 Rahmat Tahalu

text: __Train your heart__ to _not be arrogant_ and __to be humble__, and __train your eyes__ not to __look down__ on others.
author: (c) 2025 Mr Sanjaya Kerang Dayo

text: It’s okay. No human is ___perfect___ ... perfection __belongs only to Allah SWT.__ _Thank you_ ....
author: (c) 2025 Mr Bejo Riyatno M3A

text: There’s no such thing as a __wrong path__, everyone is _fighting_ with ___their own fate___.
author: (c) 2025 Thariq Batu Kajang
